title: Pressure mounts on Chelsea coach Mourinho to play Ghana defender Baba Rahman
text:
15:10 CET Pressure mounts on Chelsea coach Mourinho to play Ghana defender Baba Rahman - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Pressure is mounting on Chelsea coach Jose Mourinho to play Ghana defender Baba Rahman when the English Premier League when the competition resumes this weekend. 
Mourinhoâ€™s problems are mounting, with Branislav Ivanovic expected to be out for for three weeks leaving the Stamford Bridge boss with the set-piece problem he has been dreading.
